messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] healthy children, finally
messages.msgSnippet: Hey Mary, you do what you gotta do to get some rest and to get better. . My son recently injured his eye and he felt horrible and was very irritable.  I gave
messages.messageBody:
Hey Mary, you do what you gotta do to get some rest and to get better. . My
son recently injured his eye and he felt horrible and was very irritable. I
gave him benedryl every 6 hours. It was the only thing that calmed him down
so he wasnt so fretful over his eye. Homeopathy can work wonders, Im sure.
But sometimes the old tried and true OT meds are just easier and more
convenient.

Teresa


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: healthy children, finally
messages.msgSnippet: Okay so I broke down from the homeopathic stuff and went to the good old stand by medicines. I actually gave the children a choice of taking what I had or
messages.messageBody:
Okay so I broke down from the homeopathic stuff and went to the good old
stand by medicines. I actually gave the children a choice of taking what I
had or taking their chances on the Dr. I hated doing that but I was sick of
sickness and they were too.

Triaminic cough and cold mixed with a bit of pepsi did the trick. They were
able to get it down and keep it down and are all better after just one day
of taking the stuff. Sierra had her first quiet coughless night last night
which means I finally got some much needed sleep myself. I tried so hard
without going to the meds but it just didn't work for us.

Thankful for health again.
Mary B
